description: Nice to see an updated version of this useful application!

This app is a must-have for developers! It does what it says, making it easy to work with JSONs, count symbols, words, or lines in a text, and generate URL-safe text for API requests. Plus, it allows you to create custom functions to fit your specific needs. I highly recommend it!

The app has all the required functions, with shortcuts and multiple windows that make it easy to use. I also appreciate the recent updates that synced the theme with my system - a nice touch! Overall, it's a simple yet incredibly useful tool that's become an essential part of my development workflow.
I was really looking forward to the updated version, very cool. But now there is not enough "apply" button to re-apply the script. Choosing again from the list is not very convenient.

Saves me looking up random websites online and pasting sensitive information into them. Really simple and convenient to use with a really comprehensive set of actions. I particularly appreciate the prettify JSON command and the sort alphabetically command. Thank you for making this!
